meta.subtitulo: Creation a application for people dataset with mongoDB

resumo.p: The goal is to create a application similar to the alunos application that has been implemented in class.
The data layer will be done with mongoDB. For that, we first have to import the dataset to mongoDB.
Now, the application is using NodeJs and Express,and will connect to the database with Mongoose.
The application will have the following functionalities:

ul.li: View all the info of a person

resumo.p: All the views of the app, will be done with Pug templates.
